nycTheatreExcerpt: : "Truth be told, I was not expecting to be as bowled over by this story, or this revival, as I was. But there's no arguing with talent, and with so much prowess on and off the stage, Tommy is an electric paean to rock immortality, and talent wherever one can find it."
